entry.title: Delicious!
entry.content:
I have been using tag|Connect (an Intelink social bookmarking service) at work, and have come to rely on it for link sharing and discovery. As a result, I began using del.icio.usÂ to mark places that I discover at home that might be of interest at work and visa-versa. I’ve been using del.icio.us for over a year now, but have just now imported all my bookmarks from Safari.

As a result, I now have a large number of bookmarks (the number jumped from 34 to 338), most of which are not shared (that seems to be how imported bookmarks are handled). I’m now in the slow process of discovering what bookmarks I’ve not used in a long time or were provided on my computer and of editing and sharing them…
